author: .mavrik.
content: i missed this, what is the status?

author: parithosh
content:
TLDR:
- Devnet-7 dies, Devnet-6 continues onwards
- We are attempting to rescue Holesky 
- Holesky shadowfork will come live next week until Holesky finalizes (same size as mainnet), options outlined here: https://notes.ethereum.org/@ethpandaops/path-forward-holesky
- Sepolia is a testing location for any Pectra execution layer features
